BackstoryDef.title: fallen prodigy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born in a xeno ghetto. [PAWN_possessive] father was killed accidentally by peace keeping forces.
[PAWN_pronoun] as xeno, struggled for a scholarship at the prestigious Utmaior Academy where they were sometimes bullied, sometimes treated as one of the good ones of [PAWN_possessive] kind. A genius, [PAWN_pronoun] was called a "xeno freak" even by the staff. Eventually their parents were forced to to move on to another settlement and their high quality education came to an end.
